backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user authentication, trainer authorization, workout/client data models, and storage maps for profiles, workouts, logs, and trainer codes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each major frontend file’s role, focusing on login flows, dashboards, workout management, and UI components.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Guide explaining how to configure custom domains for the Internet Computer using DNS and the ic-domains file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes with fitness‑themed colors.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists approved custom domains for the deployed frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing auth state, routing between views, session persistence, and providers for themes and React Query.
frontend/src/components/client/AssignedW: Client dashboard section that lists assigned workouts, supports logging completion, and launches the workout runner overlay.
frontend/src/components/client/Compilabl: Form component for clients to enter actual sets, reps, weight, validate inputs, and save a workout log.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutLo: Displays a client’s workout history with loading state, sorting, and log details.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutRu: Fullscreen workout runner with exercise navigation and countdown rest timer.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Bodyweig: Shows bodyweight trends with summary stats and a simple visual progression chart.
frontend/src/components/trainer/ClientWo: Renders a trainer’s list of client workouts with exercise details and optional editing.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Exercise: Displays exercise performance grouped by exercise with search filtering and progression stats.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerC: Renders client info, progress charts, and workout tools with mutations for height, weight, and workout management.
frontend/src/components/trainer/WorkoutB: Provides a form to create or edit workouts, handling exercises, validation, and submission to backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Implements a simple countdown timer hook with start, pause, reset, and completion tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating client, trainer, workout, and metric data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for themes, colors, and layout across light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Client dashboard showing assigned workouts, progress logs, and a form to add workout progress using client-specific queries.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLoginPage.tsx: Client login page handling username and PT code authentication with detailed error mapping.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Trainer dashboard displaying PT code, client list, client details, and tools for editing client info and settings.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Trainer login page that authenticates via access code and maps backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Client registration form validating username and PT code, registering the user, and auto‑authenticating on success.
frontend/src/utils/trainerAuthErrors.ts: Utility for extracting raw error messages and mapping trainer authentication errors to user-friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and syncing persisted values. Also includes utilities to remove parameters from the hash.
frontend/src/utils/workoutRestTimes.ts: Utilities to normalize, validate, format, and convert per‑set rest time values for workouts. Ensures rest times match set counts and are valid integers.
frontend/src/utils/workoutSetWeights.ts: Functions for normalizing, validating, formatting, and converting per‑set weight values. Supports padding/truncation and bigint conversion for backend use.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and component styling extensions.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current requirements, known issues, and features related to fixing trainer login reliability and error handling.
